CustomField.description: Used to provide the field set name in in request detail page or set of fields to be displayed in workflow detail page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Workflow details - Enter field API names Request details - Enter the fieldset API name Related lists - Enter the fieldset API name To enter the API names of the fields to be displayed. If API names exceeds 255 characters enter custom label name.
CustomField.label: Value
